tool_description: Fake users data for Employee Management
name: Uers API
title: Uers API

api_list.name: Get Single User
api_list.description: This Endpoint return Individual user data for the  provided user ID

api_list.name: Get all users
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://uers-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/users"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "uers-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://uers-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/users"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "uers-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
